isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE (ECM) POWER SUPPLY - BEFORE PERFORMING ANY TESTS

svcproc.title: BEFORE PERFORMING ANY TESTS
svcproc.para: Inspect ECM power relay circuit connectors for pushed back, damaged, corroded or dirty terminals as well as making sure the terminals and wires are properly crimped. Make sure connectors are properly joined together. Also check for damaged wiring, and clean, tight battery and ground connections.
